channel.title: Bakery-descriptions on Panaderia Xilonem
channel.description: Recent content in Bakery-descriptions on Panaderia Xilonem

item.title: Fresh and delicious
item.description: Everyday fresh donuts, picco’s, pizza’s and much more! Have a freshly brewed Nicaraguan coffee with your pick from the bakery, or step by to get a snack on your way. If you have special request, please let us know.

item.title: Supporting Xilonem
item.description: The bakery financially supports Esteli’s women organisation Xilonem. Have a coffee with a delicious donut while you are helping Xilonem to carry out the important work they do. If you want to know more about Xilonem, visit their website or ask when you are in the bakery!

item.title: Women empowerment
item.description: We empower women to start their own business by teaching them baking skills. In the bakery they do not only learn the baking techniques but also about their self worth and the power of sisterhood.
